mapper.sql: gift_id, gift_name, gold_price, seq_no, noble_id, noble_name, is_noble_gift, gift_type, gift_status, pic_url, has_gif_pic, gif_url, has_vgg_pic, vgg_url, is_latest, is_time_limit, has_effect, start_valid_time, end_valid_time, create_time, is_express_gift, is_can_give
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from gift
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from gift where gold_price >= 520 and gift_type = #{giftType,jdbcType=TINYINT} and gift_status = 1 order by gold_price asc
